data.text: Wuoda, ka iyie rwako wechena
ka ichiko iti ni weche mag rieko
to ka imanyo ngʼeyo malingʼ-lingʼ,
to ka idware ka fedha
eka iniwinj malongʼo tiend luoro Jehova Nyasaye,
Jehova Nyasaye chiwo rieko
Oiko loch ni joma kare,
nimar en okumba mar joma kare
Ka iwinjo wachna, eka iningʼe gima kare,
Nimar rieko nodonj e chunyi,
Rieko mar pogo tiend wach noriti,
Rieko noresi kuom yore mag joma mono,
jogo moweyo yore moriere mag bidhruok,
joma mor kuom timo maricho
jogo ma yoregi ogajore ogajore
Bende enoresi kuom dhako ma jachode,
moseweyo chwore mane okende konyako,
Nikech ode tero ji e tho
Onge ngʼato madhi ire maduogo
Kuom mano, iniluw yore joma beyo
Nimar joma kare ema nodag e piny
to joma timbegi mono nogol oko e piny
